thread.title: Giants a 5-point underdog to Eagles (Week 6, 7 NFL point spreads, over/under)
thread.title_full: Giants a 5-point underdog to Eagles (Week 6, 7 NFL point spreads, over/under)

author: Hank Domin | hdomin@syracuse.com
title: Giants a 5-point underdog to Eagles (Week 6, 7 NFL point spreads, over/under)
text:
Comments 
The Philadelphia Eagles are a five-point favorite against the New York Giants on Monday in the final NFL game of Week 6. 
The Eagles (2-3) are coming off their best performance of the season, a 39-17 win over the New Orleans Saints. The Giants (3-2) have won three games in a row. 
In Week 7, there is no line for several games, including the Buffalo Bills ' game against the Jacksonville Jaguars in London. Most games have no line because they involve a team that played Sunday night or will play Monday, but the Bills-Jaguars game doesn't have a betting line because of several key injuries. 
Below are the odds for NFL games next week courtesy of America's Line. Favorite
